function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective detection of abnormal patterns in the built environment","Impact":"Unidentified abnormal patterns may lead to delays in response and exacerbation of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement advanced pattern recognition and machine learning models to accurately detect abnormalities in the built environment","Technologies":"Machine learning, AI, advanced pattern recognition models","People":"City residents, healthcare workers, emergency response teams","Owner":"Smart city authorities, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Overlap between alert and mitigation applications","Impact":"Overlap may lead to inefficient use of resources and delayed response to emergencies","Mitigation":"Integrate alert and mitigation systems to ensure seamless coordination and response","Technologies":"Integrated alert and mitigation systems, data integration platforms","People":"Emergency response teams, city management authorities","Owner":"Smart city authorities, technology developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate crisis management and response to disease outbreaks","Impact":"Ineffective crisis management may result in delayed recognition and response to disease outbreaks, leading to widespread transmission","Mitigation":"Redesign crisis management protocols to treat disease outbreaks as critical emergencies from the onset, improve communication and coordination among healthcare institutions, and implement early warning systems","Technologies":"Early warning systems, crisis management software, data integration platforms","People":"City residents, healthcare workers, emergency response teams","Owner":"City management authorities, healthcare institutions"}]}
